ComicInfo.Summary:
"THE GATHERING STORM," Part Two
No longer willing to sit idly by as outside forces manipulate his life, Jim sends a violent warning in order to secure an uneasy alliance with one of his greatest enemies. Meanwhile, an old friend is pulled deeper into the pit of intrigue surrounding the new Hellspawn, as Marc's search into Jim's mysterious past takes a surprising turn.
ComicInfo.Tags: Terry Fitzgerald,Bludd,New Jersey,Rebecca Gebhard,Marc Rosen,New York State,The Gathering Storm,New York City,Spawn (Downing)
ComicInfo.Title: The Gathering Storm, Part 2 (of 6)
